p: This single-centred, double-blinded, randomised, controlled trial involved two sequentially recruited cohorts. The ‘antecedent’ cohort (2015/16) received influenza vaccine 3 days prior to nasal inoculation with Streptococcus pneumoniae. The ‘concurrent’ study (2016/17) reversed this order (pneumococcal inoculation was performed 3 days before influenza vaccine administration). Full cohort details have been previously described [18]. The study was EudraCT registered (2014-004634-26).
